item.title: ECL Runs Maxima in a Browser
item.description:
newer [Final CfP] 18th European Lisp. I believe it's a pretty complete implementation with fancy TeX display of formulas and nice graphics via gnuplot compiled to wasm. 280 Age (days ago) 280 Last active (days ago) List overview Download 0 comments 1 participants Add to favorites Remove from favorites tags participants (1) Raymond Toy.

Read more

item.title: First recording of a dying human brain shows waves similar to memory flashbacks
item.description:
What happens inside your brain during these experiences and after death are questions that have puzzled neuroscientists for centuries. When the heart stops beating because the brain keeps going. When is exactly the time when we die.

Read more
